Lead Forensics is an innovative and highly sophisticated Digital Marketing tool relaying simplistic yet crucial information regarding the Business Visitors to your Company website. If you're business works in a B2B market then this software will feedback to you missed new business opportunities by showing a list real time of businesses who are in the market and browsing for your products and services, whilst also highlighting exactly what their unique business needs are at this time.

Be remembered when it counts.You built your business on relationships.  Whether it's repeat business, a referral or a review we increase the value of each customer and contact by building on those connections you've already made.  OutboundEngine helps small business owners market themselves by doing it for them. We create original content for our clients, automate their email campaigns, update their social media profiles, and ultimately help them grow their business and drive long term value from their customers.

Built and managed an inside sales team, selling technology solutions to healthcare partners in Northern California, Portland and Seattle.  Daily responsibilities included coaching and developing reps in B2B sales, ensuring high standards of service, managing daily and monthly targets, interviewing and holding weekly floor-wide meeting. B2B technology sales to healthcare professionals.  Job duties included prospecting, cold calling, online presentations and implementing software to hundreds of Doctors while providing training, support, and process to ensure the functionality of technology was efficient. Handle Mid-Market accounts; Responsible for bringing on practices that range from small offices to larger corporate owned medical practices.

Rebecca Evans
Sales and Marketing Operations Manager at AppointmentPlus
August 11, 2017, Rebecca worked with Tyler in different groups

Of all the Sales Managers who I worked with during my time at OutboundEngine, Tyler is what I call a "jack of all trades". A true leader, mentor, trainer, problem solver, visionary and strategist. To be frank, I was truly impressed working with Tyler. After working closely with Tyler over the course of the past year, I see Tyler as someone who should be leading an entire sales floor as a director, and at this point would be underutilized leading a small team. Tyler's ability to coach, train, and mentor his team his bar none - he is truly an expert in the Sales Process (don't even get him started on 'Discovery'). Not only can he "do" but he can also teach others in a way that is easily consumable and repeatable, so that reps can leave his training and instantly apply it. Because of this, his team was constantly developing and improving. Not many managers possess this skill, and that's where I see many fall flat. Tyler always used data to his advantage to pinpoint where to spend his time coaching and leading his team, whether he was pulling it himself or using his resources around him. What I truly valued about working with Tyler was that he always had solutions to the problems he was bringing me, and these solutions impacted more than just his team, but the business as a whole. On top of all of the above, Tyler's business acumen, energy, intuition, and resourcefulness made him the go-to guy whenever our acting director was absent. I would recommend Tyler time and time again in any capacity, but especially if you are looking to grow your sales team and bottom line. In summary, you will be hard-pressed to find a sales leader like Tyler and I would be honored to work with him again!

Cody Frank
Director of Sales at OutboundEngine
August 9, 2017, Cody managed Tyler directly

There are sales managers who merely "talk" that they can get things done and then there are sales leaders who "do." It is an injustice of words merely to say that Tyler firmly fits in with the latter. Simply put, Tyler is the consummate sales professional who relishes and thrives in the tactics of the sales process and also has the smarts to get above the trees and craft a solid strategy for an entire organization. It has been a pleasure working with Tyler and see how fast he picks up the art of the science of selling and teaching how to sell. His unmatched patience and ability to strongly lead is unprecedented. I look forward to the opportunity to do business together again and would highly recommend him to others as both a business partner and a sales strategist to infuse some pep into your bottom line and more importantly your sales reps.

I had the opportunity of having Tyler as my manager during my duration at ZocDoc. Tyler's biggest asset is his ability to train and teach sales techniques. He is a hands-on manager. Tyler was always available to come in early or stay late with us if we asked him to. He is truly a winner. Our team was always ranked among the top in the office. April 29, 2016, John managed Tyler directly

Tyler's best assets to any sales company would include his coaching ability, fast development of new hires and carrying out the culture of the company. Though he has had great success as a sales rep in several industries, he is a natural leader and his sales experience, knowledge, attitude and people skills have also propelled him in these companies to management. I trained and managed Tyler at Zocdoc. No other sales rep before or after incorporated our process faster than Tyler. He quickly became one of our top producers and fast tracked his way into a management role. I frequently sat in on Tyler's teaching and coaching meetings with his team and learned a lot of useful information that he shared during those meetings. He has great ability to connect with everyone and more importantly share his skills and knowledge that resulted in new reps ramping up within the company to become solid producers.

Having been on Tyler's team for close to a year, I can honestly say he is the best manager I have ever had. Becky is one of those rare people that shows talent and aptitude in nearly all professional challenges she takes on.   Her understanding of sales process, business needs and her ability to communicate and connect across channels made her an indispensable asset to the growth that our office saw.  There seemed to be no project too large or too small for her; she would change seamlessly from  creating sales collateral to building an entire new channel process.  She seemed to always be looking for ways to move the needle and make an impact but, as a true leader, she recruited and welcomed ideas from all levels of business in order to ensure she delivered the best results possible.  I feel fortunate to have had an opportunity to work with Becky and I recommend her to anyone that wants to increase efficiency and effectiveness of their sales floor.   She is a true A player and innovator.

I have now had the pleasure of having Ray as a member of my team twice; once at Zocdoc and now at Outboundengine.  Ray has a natural ability to connect and communicate with customers and produce results regardless of the product he sells.  However, what made me so eager to recruit and retain him for the past for years is his ability to impact the entire sales floor with his infectious optimism and passion.  Every sales leader knows that the first step is getting the right people on the bus and Ray is a great example of what the right people look like.  Few reps can impact revenue and culture the way Ray can and, for this reason, I give him this recommendation.

summary: Proven sales leader with over a decade of experience in building relationships, coaching and developing talent, and managing high level sales professionals. B2B sales and management experience in finance, technology, healthcare and SaaS.  By creating a culture of excellence, I have helped companies increase revenue, reach and reputation by penetrating tough markets, minimizing ramp-up time for new hires and coaching reps to their potential. * Sales Coaching and Development* Sales process development and implementation* Channel restructure design and implementation
